items.title: Real-time Collaborative Task Boards
items.description: Implement task boards that allow multiple team members to view, create, edit, and assign tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can simultaneously update the same task board without data conflicts.
Changes made by one user are visible to all other connected users within 2 seconds.
Users can assign tasks to specific team members and set due dates.
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Real-time updates must have latency under 2 seconds.

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed the core feature is a collaborative task board with real-time updates. Additional features like chat, file sharing, or notifications may be considered in future iterations.
